title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-11] [$250] Get Assistance workflow from bank account page doesn't match other workflows
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to https://staging.new.expensify.com/
2. Tap profile --- workspaces --- create a new workspace
3. Tap Profile > Tap more features
5. Enable Workflows
6. Tap Workflows -- tap connect bank account

8. Tap help question mark on top left
9. On the Get Assistance page, tap "chat with concierge" and tap device back button
10. Notice user is directed to workflow page
11. Tap explore help docs and tap device back button
12. Notice User correctly navigated back to "get assistance page"

Expected result: Expected Result: When tapping Back should navigate to Get assistance page for all the scenarios

- Tapping "Chat with Concierge" and pressing Back button redirects to "workflow page"
- Tapping "Schedule a setup call" and pressing Back button redirects to Get assistance page
- Tapping "Explore help docs" and pressing Back button redirects to Get assistance page

Actual result: None
